Package: com.jcatalog.grailsflow.actions

[Groovy] Class ActionUtils

    • com.jcatalog.grailsflow.actions.ActionUtils

    • ActionUtils is a helper class that gives possibility to convert String object representation to necessary type. Type is represented as a simple class name. Following types are supported: 1. Boolean 2. Date 3. Double 4. Integer 5. Long 6. String 7. Document 8. Link 9. List 10. Map

      Authors:
      Stephan Albers
      July Karpey
